import classnames from 'classnames' import { gql } from 'apollo-boost' import { useQuery } from '@apollo/react-hooks' import styles from './styles.module.scss' import AutoPlaySlider from '@/components/sliders/IndexSlider' const GET_RECENT_POSTS = gql` query getPostsByType($type: String, $quantity: Int) { getPostsByType(type: $type, quantity: $quantity) { title description content image created_at slug # cat_name # cat_slug # tags_names } } ` const IndexLayout = () => { const quantity = 3 const { loading, error, data } = useQuery(GET_RECENT_POSTS, { variables: { type: 'slider', quantity } }) if (error) return

Error

Loading...

const fetchedPosts = data.getPostsByType return <> } export default IndexLayout
